data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Puebla.
In the minute 3, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Andre Pierre Gignac gives Tigres a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 7, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Eduardo Vargas.
Luis Quinones instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 10, In Nuevo Leon Puebla drive forward through Santiago Ormeno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Tigres in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Tigres's area.
In the minute 18, Christian Tabo (Puebla) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Tigres.
Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tigres's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 22, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Tigres needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Tigres defence as Santiago Ormeno fires in a strike for Puebla.
In the minute 30, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Tigres's area.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Puebla a goal kick.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 39, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Puebla just outside Tigres's area.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 43, In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Carlos Salcedo for Tigres has been booked by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo and receives a first yellow card.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Tigres's Luis Quinones has run offside.
In the minute 45, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Puebla throw-in in Tigres's half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 45, Tigres needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo blows to end the first-half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo has blown to start the second-half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Puebla throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 46, Brayan Angulo is on a sub for Daniel Alvarez for Puebla.
George Corral is replacing Nestor Vicente Vidrio for the away team.
In the minute 48, Free kick Tigres.
Throw-in Tigres.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Tigres are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 54, Attention is being given to Puebla’s Daniel Arreola and play has been suspended briefly.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Puebla’s Daniel Arreola is on his feet again at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Juan Reynoso is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Bernardo Cuesta replacing Salvador Reyes.
In the minute 56, Puebla to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Estadio Universitario (UANL), Luis Quinones has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 57, Puebla drives forward and Brayan Angulo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) heads in to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 57, Omar Fernandez with an assist there.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Tigres.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a second substitution, with Jorge Torres replacing Rafael Carioca.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Luis Quinones with Julian Quinones. This is the first substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 64, Puebla have a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Santiago Ormeno.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Javier Aquino for Tigres who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Omar Fernandez with Amaury Escoto.
Tigres's Javier Aquino is back in action after a slight knock.
Santiago Ormeno for Puebla is back on the field again.
In the minute 67, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 71, Christian Tabo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Christian Tabo (Puebla) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alejandro Chumacero.
Carlos Salcedo (Tigres) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 74, Free kick Puebla.
Puebla's George Corral gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Tigres a goal kick.
Tigres make their third substitution with Hugo Ayala replacing Eduardo Vargas.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 80, Amaury Escoto for Puebla drives towards goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tigres's half?
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 84, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Amaury Escoto of Puebla smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 88, Puebla's Amaury Escoto is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 89, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Puebla.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Tigres.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Nuevo Leon.
Puebla's Alejandro Chumacero gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the effort is unsuccessful.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres.
In Nuevo Leon, Tigres push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
